sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script is to revert back to old native mobile "Genius Result" card from the new "Genius Result v2" cards shipped as part of Utah next experience. This script is only for the customers who have upgraded to Utah and want to go back to old mobile views.</description>
        <name>Mobile Revert Next Exp - NowMobileSearch</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[//Switch runManually to true in order to run this script
var runManually = false;
if (runManually) {
    var util = new sn_me.MobileNextExpUpgradeUtil();
    revertPeopleGeniusResultCard();
    revertUserProfileItemView();
}

function revertUserProfileItemView() {
    util.switchLegacyView("sys_sg_form_screen", "37917d004d0c2010f87749679b47748f", "a006ed9707b81910264f78e99cd300a6", false);
}

function revertPeopleGeniusResultCard() {
    util.switchConnection("sys_sg_master_item", "view_config", "e4aa87ccc7331010d558c943c7c260ee", "5231be0c772511109033bfeacf5a99c6", "3eeacbccc7331010d558c943c7c26049");
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-25 09:03:14</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4005551153e15110fedfddeeff7b128e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Mobile Revert Next Exp - NowMobileSearch</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Search Configurations for mobile" source="sn_me_search">b3f3303477232300454792718a1061df</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Search Configurations for mobile">b3f3303477232300454792718a1061df</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4005551153e15110fedfddeeff7b128e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-26 04:40:39</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>true</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
